Text:
MFC receives and uses data from internal and external self-reported sources. Some of the type of data we collect is listed as follows:

Information Collected: Company and business professional information, including business contact information such as name, title, address, phone number, fax number, and e-mail address, domain names, and trade associations.

Source of Information Collected: Public County and Government Sources, Census Data and Data Suppliers. We collect information offline from business owners and principals, from third parties and suppliers, and from public records such as business registrations, Uniform Commercial Code filings.

Purpose of Information Collected: Data Marketing/ Marketing Services, Analysis. MFC has collected information about businesses to deliver products and services that assist our customers in making critical commercial decisions.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: You have the right to request access to your personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: You have the right to request deletion of all your personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: You have the right to opt out of the sale of your personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: You have the right to not be discriminated against for exercising any of your CCPA rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: Click Here to OPT OUT of sale of your information: DO NOT SELL OR SHARE MY PERSONAL INFORMATION, or call us at Toll Free at (888)681-6632 and request to have your CCPA rights exercised.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Changes to Privacy Policy
MFC may make may update or change this privacy policy at any time and such changes will become effective the date it is updated, unless otherwise stated. We encourage you to review our privacy policy whenever you use this web site.

Data Collection and Use
MFC receives and uses data from internal and external self-reported sources. Some of the type of data we collect is listed as follows:

Information Collected: Company and business professional information, including business contact information such as name, title, address, phone number, fax number, and e-mail address, domain names, and trade associations.

Source of Information Collected: Public County and Government Sources, Census Data and Data Suppliers. We collect information offline from business owners and principals, from third parties and suppliers, and from public records such as business registrations, Uniform Commercial Code filings.

Purpose of Information Collected: Data Marketing/ Marketing Services, Analysis. MFC has collected information about businesses to deliver products and services that assist our customers in making critical commercial decisions.
